stitch/es half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet decrease = together hk = hook treble_crochet = treble_crochet lp/s = loop/s yo = yarn over special stitches dc3tog double_crochet 3 stitches together working over next 3 sts yo insert hk into next st pull up a lp yo and draw through 2 lps on hk 3 times 4 lps on hk yo and draw through all 4 lps double_crochet join yo insert hk into top of beg chain/st indicated complete a double_crochet the double_crochet will lay horizontally and act as a chain-2 join for the corner space the working yarn should now be aligned at the righthand side of the corner space to begin the next round dtr double treble_crochet yo 3 times insert hk in specified st yo pull up a lp yo draw through 2 lps on hk 4 times fpdc front post double_crochet yo insert hk from front to back and to front again around post of st indicated yo and pull up a lp 3 lps on hk yo and draw through 2 lps twice shell work 5 treble_crochet in same st/space v-st double_crochet chain
